properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 4:59PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...

Oostanaula River near Calhoun affecting Gordon County

Kettle Creek near Washington affecting Wilkes County


.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Oostanaula River near Calhoun.
* From this afternoon until further notice.
* At 445 PM Thursday the stage was 21 feet, and rising.
* Flood stage is 21 feet.
* At 21 feet, minor flooding begins in the woodlands,fields and
pastures upstream and downstream from the gage behind a water
treatment plant off Mauldin Road. A boat ramp and portions of a
small parking lot on the upstream and right bank side of the Georgia
Highway 136 Connector will be under water.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts...and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.

The latest stage data was furnished in cooperation with the United
States Geological Survey.
